biotools.summary: Tinker-HP is a tool for high-performance massively parallel evolution of tinker on CPUs & GPUs. It is used to accelerating molecular dynamics simulations of large complex systems with advanced point dipole polarizable force fields using GPUs and multi-GPU systems.

bioschemas.name: Tinker-HP
